subject: Last CFP:: EBW2015- France:: March 26-28, 2015
from: "The Third International Conference on E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2015)" <donotreply@sdiwc.us>
body:
**************************************************************
The Third International Conference on E-Technologies and Business on the Web (EBW2015)
                             
              ESG Management School, Paris, France
                       March 26-28, 2015

                 http://sdiwc.net/conferences/ebw2015/
**************************************************************
***E-Business	
***E-Business Applications and Software
***E-Commerce Strategy Implementation	
***E-Commerce in Developing Countries
***E-Communities	
***E-Learning
***E-commerce business models	
***E-commerce Payment Systems
***E-commerce Technology Adoption	
***E-commerce, E-Business Strategies

**************************************************************
Important Dates

Submission Dates	  : Feb. 28, 2015
Notification of Acceptance: Feb 12, 2015 March 08, 2015
Camera Ready Submission   : Open from now until March 16, 2015
Registration Deadline     : Open from now until March 16, 2015
Conference Dates          : March 26-28, 2015
